description: Decimal expansion of Laplace's limit constant.
comments: Maximum value taken by the function x/cosh(x), which occurs at A085984. - _Hrothgar_, Mar 12 2014
references: S. R. Finch, Mathematical Constants, Cambridge, 2003, pp. 266-268.

J. J. Green, The Lipschitz constant for the radial projection on real l_p - implementation notes, http://soliton.vm.bytemark.co.uk/pub/jjg/code/lcrp-inote.pdf, 2012. - From _N. J. A. Sloane_, Sep 19 2012
